name: Tim's Adventure (Jamie Buttenshaw)
description:
Tim's Adventure is an open world role playing game where you play as Tim the Jelly Bean, and you've been set on a magical quest to save a land riddled with evil from the formidable Jelly Monster and its army of evil beans.

Explore the huge realm, collect useful items, meet quirky characters and battle evil beans! An experience full of magic and mystery, with a mystical world to explore as your group of jelly beans and formidable foes to duel with the turn-based combat system.

Originally created as an entry for the 2018 BAFTA Young Game Designers competition, and it made it to the finals in the 15-18 year old category.
